description:
Thanks to some foxy sabotage, Chopper has been lost to the enemy. The only hope for getting him back lies with Zoro and Sanji, but can they learn to work together in time to save the little reindeer?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai 2 Kaisen! Buchi Kome Groggy Ring
Round 2! Shoot It into the Groggy Ring!
Sanji e Zoro alle prese con il secondo round
Second round ! Le but du Groggy Ring !
Второй этап! Бойня на Хмельном ринге
ศึกรอบที่สอง! ถล่มคล็อกกี้ริงก์
第2回戦! ブチ込めグロッキーリング
